version_description: Bug fixes
Bug fixes

Completely redesigned to put the most important features hunters love first!

Quickly get a hunting forecast by searching or plotting pins, navigate to hunting locations easily, and see how other hunters in the community are doing!

Completely redesigned to put the most important features hunters love first!

Quickly get a hunting forecast by searching or plotting pins, navigate to hunting locations easily, and see how other hunters in the community are doing!
Bug fixes & "Pro" upgrade option
Bug fixes & "Pro" upgrade option
Bug Fixes
Bug Fixes
Pro badge added to usernames and various bug fixes.
Pro badge added to usernames and various bug fixes.

Brought back the 5 "deer head" prediction for 14 different species upon popular request!
NEW ScentDrift animated wind map
Added the ability to share locations with other hunters
PRO users can now search public phone records for parcel owner information
Added the ability to turn off notifications of different types
Added Help & Support on the settings screen
Added the ability to invite Facebook users and your contacts
Added ability to @mention people in comments
Allows you to get a prediction from the map view
Small bug fixes and crash fixes

HuntWise 5.0 includes a new Gear Tab in the bottom navigation bar.


If you find gear that you want, add it to your cart and purchase.

If you see gear that you own, rate and review the items so others can make informed purchase decisions.

This update also includes a 7 day free trial for the Pro-Subscription upgrade.

HuntWise 5.0 includes a new Gear Tab in the bottom navigation bar.


If you find gear that you want, add it to your cart and purchase.

If you see gear that you own, rate and review the items so others can make informed purchase decisions.

This update also includes a 7 day free trial for the Pro-Subscription upgrade.
Bug fix:  App crash on Forecast tab
Bug fix:  App crash on Forecast tab

HuntWise 5.1.0 includes a 7 Day Free Trial for Pro subscription!  We've also added a new Profile design that includes a "My Gear" icon. Find gear that you use in the gear shop, add it to your gear bag, and post a photo with the gear item attached. Get gear ratings and reviews from the HuntWise community so that you can make informed purchase decisions.

HuntWise 5.1.0 includes a 7 Day Free Trial for Pro subscription!  We've also added a new Profile design that includes a "My Gear" icon. Find gear that you use in the gear shop, add it to your gear bag, and post a photo with the gear item attached. Get gear ratings and reviews from the HuntWise community so that you can make informed purchase decisions.
Gear Shop:  Find hunting gear items with the new gear search bar and narrow results with filters.
Gear Shop:  Find hunting gear items with the new gear search bar and narrow results with filters.

Gear Shop: Deal of the Week
Offline Maps
Land contour map layer
Manage your land with custom pins
New navigation features

Gear Shop: Deal of the Week
Offline Maps
Land contour map layer
Manage your land with custom pins
New navigation features

Deal of the Week - We've teamed up with the best brands in the hunting industry to offer trusted products at the lowest prices. Save up to 40% off + Free shipping!

Offline Maps - Save maps of your hunting locations to plan strategies, navigate, and manage your land when you are in remotes locations and don't have cell service.

Custom Markers - Manage your hunting locations with markers that visually represent your stands, blinds, food plots, water sources, trail cams, waypoints, and other custom markers with GPS accuracy

Land Contours - Understand the terrain and elevation changes with the new topo map layer

Tracking - See your current location on the map in real time to navigate to custom way points. If you have HuntWise Pro, confidently hunt and scout properties by seeing where you stand in relation to land boundary lines.

Deal of the Week - We've teamed up with the best brands in the hunting industry to offer trusted products at the lowest prices. Save up to 40% off + Free shipping!

Offline Maps - Save maps of your hunting locations to plan strategies, navigate, and manage your land when you are in remotes locations and don't have cell service.

Custom Markers - Manage your hunting locations with markers that visually represent your stands, blinds, food plots, water sources, trail cams, waypoints, and other custom markers with GPS accuracy

Land Contours - Understand the terrain and elevation changes with the new topo map layer

Tracking - See your current location on the map in real time to navigate to custom way points. If you have HuntWise Pro, confidently hunt and scout properties by seeing where you stand in relation to land boundary lines.

NEW FEATURES
- Compare stands by ideal wind
- View latitude/longitude coordinates for each stand
- Manual entry of latitude/longitude coordinates to add a marker
- Log a hunt directly from each plotted stand
- For each gear item, we added the ability to watch related videos, see other hunters who used that item, and see any logs posted with that item.
- Added the option to purchase a monthly subscription

BUG FIXES
- Several small bug fixes
- Fixed mentioning usernames with capital letters

- Added the option to purchase a monthly subscription

Hunting land for sale is now displayed on the map.
Users can quickly view regulations and buy a license from their profile.
Users can now add a bio and bio link.
Profile has additional privacy settings.
Profile now displays favorited hunting land for sale.
PRO users can now link their YouTube video channel to display on their profile.
Prediction screen includes better selectors for changing species.
Bugs fixed for reporting or deleting logs.
Other general bugs were fixed.

Thanks for using HuntWise! We update our app regularly to bring you the best features available in the hunting industry. Here’s what you will find in the latest update.
-Introduction to hundreds of public and private map layers available nation wide
-New map design to discover all statistics available at your desired locations
-New social design to help you connect and talk shop with other hunters
-Bug fixes to keep your app running at optimal speeds

We've been hard at work updating the HuntWise App. With this newest update we have:
+ Provided UI/UX updates for the Map Tab and the About This Location Features.
+ Made it easier to Rename User Created Properties.
+ Made the App remember the last species you predicted hunting conditions for.
+ Added Acreage Labeling to Landowner Properties, Plats, and Parcels.
+ Included Additional General Bug Fixes

We've been hard at work updating the HuntWise App. With this newest update we have:
+ Provided UI/UX updates for the Map Tab and the About This Location Features.
+ Made it easier to Rename User Created Properties.
+ Made the App remember the last species you predicted hunting conditions for.
+ Added Acreage Labeling to Landowner Properties, Plats, and Parcels.
+ Included Additional General Bug Fixes

We’ve been hard at work updating HuntWise. Here’s what’s new:
+ Revamped the ability to share Pins and Properties with others.
+ Integrated Social Discovery Filters to sort by location, relevance, and more.
+ Added Video Content to the Log Feed.
+ Restored functionality for reseting account password.
+ Provided additional bug fixes and optimizations.

Now you can compare stands by ideal wind right from the HuntCast tab.  We've also moved ScentDrift to the top of the HuntCast detail page and allow you to zoom and scroll the ScentDrift map.  There are a few other small bug fixes too.  Good luck out there!

We’re excited to launch Gear Deals. Now in the gear tab, HuntWise PRO users will get up to 30% off top brands in the industry like MTN OPS, Elite Archery, Hunter Specialties, Scott Archery, Otterbox, and 35+ other brands. You can now access some of the best brands in the industry at a better price.

Other highlights we made in this app update:
• New turkey icons for the Map
• Improved registration process
• Various bug fixes and enhancements

More, new, and better map features have been added to HuntWise to give you a year-round scouting advantage for every species you hunt. With this release, we’ve:
• Added improved satellite imagery to provide greater clarity and more perspective on the land that you hunt.
• Added multiple new base layer options that allow you to toggle between major satellite and topo mapping providers to scout how you want, with the base layers you want.
• Added, categorized, and color-coded a range of new map pins, allowing you to mark up your maps with pins that mean more and fit every situation you encounter.
• Improved our offline maps process and capabilities, making it easier to save what you need and use what you saved when you’re without cell service.
• Provided additional bug fixes, enhancements, and performance updates to further optimize the app at large.

You spoke, we listened. HuntWise is designed to equip you for success in the field, and with the introduction of HuntCast 2.0, we are taking that commitment to the next level. With an improved algorithm offering better weather predictions and more data points to inform you on your hunt, HuntCast 2.0 is the most powerful deer prediction algorithm the market has ever seen.

Key Updates:

• HuntCast Alerts - Always be in-the-know when it comes to best hunting times for success. Set and customize alerts for specific species wherever you hunt.

• Localized Rut Detection - We’ve identified at a county level when the rut will start in the area you hunt. We’ll notify you when the rut is heating up and this will be reflected in your HuntCast score.

• 15-Day Forecast - Get the most powerful deer movement prediction tool in the world. With the HuntCast algorithm, you can plan your hunt with a 15-day forecast of peak movement times.

• Whitetail Strategy 365 - Optimize your hunting season with access to important insights and events within the whitetail hunting calendar. From when to plant food plots to peak rut and opening dates, we keep you in the know, so you can focus on the hunt.

Key Updates:

• HuntCast Alerts - Always be in-the-know when it comes to best hunting times for success. Set and customize alerts for specific species wherever you hunt.

• Localized Rut Detection - We’ve identified at a county level when the rut will start in the area you hunt. We’ll notify you when the rut is heating up and this will be reflected in your HuntCast score.

• 15-Day Forecast - Get the most powerful deer movement prediction tool in the world. With the HuntCast algorithm, you can plan your hunt with a 15-day forecast of peak movement times.

• Whitetail Strategy 365 - Optimize your hunting season with access to important insights and events within the whitetail hunting calendar. From when to plant food plots to peak rut and opening dates, we keep you in the know, so you can focus on the hunt.

You spoke, we listened. HuntWise is designed to equip you for success in the field, and with the introduction of HuntCast 2.0, we are taking that commitment to the next level. With an improved algorithm offering better weather predictions and more data points to inform you on your hunt, HuntCast 2.0 is the most powerful deer prediction algorithm the market has ever seen.

The HuntWise Toolset just got a lot more powerful. With the introduction of new features including updated markers, hunt areas, and more, we've made the most diverse hunting toolset on the market faster and easier to navigate than ever before. HuntWise is designed to help hunters pursue their passion, and we've focused on the updates you've requested to optimize your time in the field.

• Updated Create Marker & Marker Detail UI - In the field, markers are one of your most valuable tools. We've streamlined your ability to create and save markers and add in-depth marker details.

• Updated Create Hunt Area UI - You can now set up a hunt area by quickly tapping parcels, manually drawing boundaries, or fitting the hunt area directly to your screen.

• Added ability to add Notes & Photos to Markers - In a constant effort to improve the quality of map content within HuntWise, we've introduced the ability to add photos and notes to your Markers. Along with customizable icons and colors within each shareable Marker, this new feature elevates the usefulness of Markers as a tool while in the field and scouting from home.

• Added ability to toggle visibility for Markers - While scanning your hunt map, you can increase visibility by hiding or showing your Markers based on use.

• Added ability to move Markers - It's a lot easier to make the most of your time with the ability to move previously created markers.

• Several general bug fixes and stability improvements
